branchCategory.name: Compact Direct Solenoid Valve, Ports M5 ~ 1/8 inch
branchCategory.description: <p>The VDW series is a compact direct operated 2/3 port solenoid valve for air, water and medium vacuum. Available body materials include resin, brass or stainless steel. Resin body is offered with one touch fitting to reduce installation time. It is suitable for applications that requires a small footprint and flow of less than Cv of 0.30.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Compact Direct Solenoid Valve, Ports M5 ~ 1/8 inch

branchItem.name: VDW10/12/14, Compact Direct Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Air/Water/Medium Vacuum, Single Unit
branchItem.description: <p>The VDW size 1 is available with resin, brass or stainless steel body with orifice size up to 1/16 inch. Resin body is offered with one touch fitting to reduce installation time. Maximum Cv is 0.07.</p>

branchItem.name: VDW22/24, Compact Direct Operated 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Medium Vacuum/Water, Single Unit
